lines.text: [Jake is seeing Alex's mother who doesn't seem to like Jake]
So, Jake... are you a good lover? Are you aggressive or do you take your time?
Why don't you close the door and you'll find out.
Why don't you take off your clothes?
I want to see the outline of your body through your nightgown.
He made love like he worked on the street - tender as a jackhammer.
